content: This article **is an orphan, as no other articles link to it**. Please introduce links to this page from related articles. *(December 2025)*TV series or program **The Angel, the Devil and I** is a series of online English TV drama produced by [Singaporean Government](/wiki/Government_of_Singapore) in 2018, starring [Mark Lee](/wiki/Mark_Lee_(Singaporean_actor)), Judee Tan, Serina Sng, [Stella Seah](/wiki/Stella_Seah) and Vee. Its content is primarily related to Civic [Education in Singapore](/wiki/Education_in_Singapore). ## Theme EpisodePrimary theme1Healthy food in Chinese New Year2Healthy food cooking3Daily life habit of environmental protection4[Fake News](/wiki/Fake_news)5Wealth Management6Career Connect by Singaporean 7SingPass8Personal Health Check This drama television programâ€“related article is a stub. title: The Angel, the Devil and I
